1.name: The AristoCats
1.description: With the help of a smooth talking tomcat, a family of Parisian felines set to inherit a fortune from their owner try to make it back home after a jealous butler kidnaps them and leaves them in the country.

2.name: MASH
2.description: The staff of a Korean War field hospital use humor and high jinks to keep their sanity in the face of the horror of war.

3.name: Two Mules for Sister Sara
3.description: Nun Sara (Shirley MacLaine) is on the run in Mexico and is saved from cowboys by Hogan (Clint Eastwood), who is preparing for a future mission to capture a French fort. The pair become good friends, but Sara never does tell him the true reason behind her being outlawed.

4.name: Catch-22
4.description: A man is trying desperately to be certified insane during World War II, so he can stop flying missions.

5.name: Kelly's Heroes
5.description: A group of U.S. soldiers sneaks across enemy lines to get their hands on a secret stash of Nazi treasure.

6.name: Love Story
6.description: A boy and a girl from different backgrounds fall in love regardless of their upbringing - and then tragedy strikes.

7.name: El Topo
7.description: A mysterious black-clad gunfighter wanders a mystical Western landscape encountering multiple bizarre characters.

8.name: Patton
8.description: The World War II phase of the career of the controversial American general, George S. Patton.

9.name: Beyond the Valley of the Dolls
9.description: Three girls come to Hollywood to make it big, but find only sex, drugs and sleaze.

10.name: Little Big Man
10.description: Jack Crabb, looking back from extreme old age, tells of his life being raised by Native Americans and fighting with General Custer.

11.name: Waterloo
11.description: Facing the decline of everything he has worked to obtain, conqueror Napoleon Bonaparte and his army confront the British at the Battle of Waterloo.

12.name: Valerie a týden divu
12.description: Inspired by fairy-tales such as Alice in Wonderland and Little Red-Riding Hood, "Valerie and her Week of Wonders" is a surreal tale in which love, fear, sex and religion merge into one fantastic world.

13.name: Airport
13.description: A bomber on board an airplane, an airport almost closed by snow, and various personal problems of the people involved.

14.name: Beneath the Planet of the Apes
14.description: The sole survivor of an interplanetary rescue mission searches for the only survivor of the previous expedition. He discovers a planet ruled by apes and an underground city run by telepathic humans.

15.name: Five Easy Pieces
15.description: A dropout from upper-class America picks up work along the way on oil rigs when his life isn't spent in a squalid succession of bars, motels, and other points of interest.

16.name: The Vampire Lovers
16.description: Seductive vampire Carmilla Karnstein and her family target the beautiful and the rich in a remote area of late eighteenth-century Gemany.

17.name: Zabriskie Point
17.description: At Zabriskie Point, United States' lowest point, two perfect strangers meet; an undergraduate dreamer and a young hippie student who start off an unrestrained romance, making love on the dusty terrain.

18.name: A Man Called Horse
18.description: In 1825, an English aristocrat is captured by Native Americans. He lives with them and begins to understand their way of life. Eventually, he is accepted as part of the tribe and aspires to become their leader.

19.name: Hercules in New York
19.description: Hercules is sent to Earth where he finds true love and starts a promising career in the bodybuilder business.

20.name: The Landlord
20.description: At the age of twenty-nine, Elgar Enders "runs away" from home. This running away consists of buying a building in a black ghetto in the Park Slope section of Brooklyn. Initially his ...                See full summary »

21.name: Rio Lobo
21.description: After the Civil War, Cord McNally searches for the traitor whose treachery caused the defeat of McNally's unit and the loss of a close friend.

22.name: Il conformista
22.description: A weak-willed Italian man becomes a fascist flunky who goes abroad to arrange the assassination of his old teacher, now a political dissident.

23.name: Lo chiamavano Trinità...
23.description: A lazy, unorthodox gunfighter and his portly, horse-thieving brother defend a Mormon settlement from a land-grabbing Major, a Mexican bandit, and their henchmen.

24.name: The Cheyenne Social Club
24.description: An aging cowboy finds to his embarrassment that the successful business he has inherited from his brother is actually a house of prostitution.

25.name: The Reckoning
25.description: Michael Marler, a successful business man in London, is about to make his way to the top. The death of his father brings him - after five years - back to his hometown Liverpool, where he is...                See full summary »

26.name: Tora! Tora! Tora!
26.description: In 1941, following months of economic embargo, Japan prepares to open its war against the United States with a preventive strike on the US naval base at Pearl Harbor.

27.name: Ryan's Daughter
27.description: Set in the wake of the 1916 Easter Rising, a married woman in a small Irish village has an affair with a troubled British officer.

28.name: When Dinosaurs Ruled the Earth
28.description: Set in the ancient past when humans and dinosaurs lived together, a small tribe is struggling to survive by giving a sacrifice of a blond woman to their god, the sun, in return for ...                See full summary »

29.name: Scream and Scream Again
29.description: A serial killer who drains his victims' blood is on the loose in London. The police follow him to a house owned by an eccentric scientist.

30.name: L'uccello dalle piume di cristallo
30.description: An American writer and his English girlfriend are stalked by a serial killer terrorizing Rome after the former witnesses a murder attempt on a woman's life.

31.name: They Call Me Mister Tibbs!
31.description: In San Francisco, a high-priced call girl is murdered and the case is assigned to Police Lieutenant Virgil Tibbs.

32.name: Deep End
32.description: 15-year-old dropout Mike takes a job at Newford Baths, where inappropriate sexual behaviour abounds, and becomes obsessed with his coworker Susan.

33.name: Taste the Blood of Dracula
33.description: Three distinguished English gentlemen accidentally resurrect Count Dracula, killing a disciple of his in process. The Count seeks to avenge his dead servant, by making the trio die in the hands of their own children.

34.name: Joe
34.description: Two men, Bill, a wealthy conservative, and Joe, a far-right factory worker, form a dangerous bond after Bill confesses to murdering his daughter's drug dealer boyfriend to Joe.

35.name: Le cercle rouge
35.description: After leaving prison, master thief Corey crosses paths with a notorious escapee and an alcoholic former policeman. The trio proceed to plot an elaborate heist.

36.name: A Man Called Sledge
36.description: In the Old West, a gunfighting outlaw connives his way into a prison in hopes of getting his hands on a large shipment of gold stored there.

37.name: House of Dark Shadows
37.description: Vampire Barnabas Collins is accidentally released from his centuries-long confinement at his family's estate in Maine. He targets his clueless descendants who live there now and pursues Maggie, the incarnation of his lost love.

38.name: Performance
38.description: A violent gangster seeks refuge from the mob in the Bohemian home of a former rock star.

39.name: Myra Breckinridge
39.description: After undergoing gender reassignment surgery, an aspiring actress travels to Hollywood, where she also wants to make a claim on her wealthy uncle's estate.

40.name: The Honeymoon Killers
40.description: An obese, embittered nurse doesn't mind if her toupee-wearing boyfriend romances and fleeces other women, as long as he takes her along on his con jobs.

41.name: Hexen bis aufs Blut gequält
41.description: In 1700s Austria, a witch-hunter's apprentice has doubts about the righteousness of witch-hunting when he witnesses the brutality, the injustice, the falsehood, the torture and the arbitrary killing that go with the job.

42.name: Cromwell
42.description: Oliver Cromwell can no longer tolerate King Charles' policies, and the self-interest of the ruling class, and leads a civil war to install Parliament as the ultimate ruler of England.

43.name: Scars of Dracula
43.description: A young man, Paul Carlson, is on a trip and spends the night at Count Dracula's castle. He is murdered. After some time has passed, the young man's brother Simon comes to the small town ...                See full summary »

44.name: I Walk the Line
44.description: Henry Tawes is the sheriff in a small town in Tennessee. A man of strong moral fiber, he is always quick to judge others and follows the law zealously. Then he meets Alma, a beautiful young...                See full summary »

45.name: De Sade 70
45.description: An innocent girl goes to spend the weekend on an island with a woman and her brother, but soon she finds herself entangled in a web of dream-like sexual experiments.

46.name: The Wizard of Gore
46.description: A TV talk-show hostess and her boyfriend investigate a shady magician whom has the ability to hypnotize and control the thoughts of people in order to stage gory on-stage illusions using his powers of mind bending.

47.name: Trog
47.description: A sympathetic anthropologist uses drugs and surgery to try to communicate with a primitive troglodyte who is found living in a local cave.

48.name: Colossus: The Forbin Project
48.description: Thinking this will prevent war, the US government gives an impenetrable supercomputer total control over launching nuclear missiles. But what the computer does with the power is unimaginable to its creators.

49.name: The Private Life of Sherlock Holmes
49.description: When a bored Holmes eagerly takes the case of Gabrielle Valladon after an attempt on her life, the search for her missing husband leads to Loch Ness and the legendary monster.

50.name: Chisum
50.description: Cattle baron John Chisum joins forces with Billy the Kid and Pat Garrett to fight the Lincoln County land war.
